titles.title: Safe Skies Cargo Inspection Act
To ensure the safety of passengers aboard aircraft that also carries cargo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 11/17/2005--Introduced. Safe Skies Cargo Inspection Act - Amends federal transportation law to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish a system to inspect all cargo transported on passenger aircraft operated by a domestic or foreign air carrier in air transportation or intrastate air transportation.
